Name: Endless Savagery
About the game: Crowds of enemies, explosions and blood - this is what awaits you in Endless Savagery! Survive, collect new weapons and shoot waves of enemies growing with every minute, try to survive as long as possible. Upgrades for the character will help defeat even the most powerful enemies in this insane arena! Many different enemies and types of weapons, six categories of upgrades and endless survival in the arena - this is Endless Savagery.
